column2: Ash.plot = ggplot(median.Ash_Content, aes(x = Median_Ash, y = reorder(Ash_Content, +Median_Ash), fill = reorder(Ash_Content, +Median_Ash) )) + geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 0.5) + labs(title = "Median of Ash Content by Group", x = "Median Value of Ash Content by Group", y = "Groups") + theme(legend.position="none") + scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(0, 3, 0.5)) + scale_y_discrete(labels = c("Low" = "Low below 2.3", "Moderate" = "Moderate between 2.3 - 2.6", "High" = "High Above 2.6")) + coord_flip()
